input_text:
Job Title: MakarttPro Leadership Development Program

Location: Dallas, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
MakarttPro is a leading provider of professional nail products products. With a commitment to innovation and excellence, we offer a wide range of products including monomer, acrylic powders, soft gel, gel polishes, and more. As a rapidly growing brand in the beauty industry, we are dedicated to delivering exceptional products and services to our customers worldwide.
Position Overview:We are seeking a dynamic and hard-working content creator, digital marketer, and product manager to join our leadership development program. This is a 4-year long program focused on building your leadership and management skills. We need someone who is ready to advance their career at a fast rate. This position is a rotational position between different areas of our company so that you can see how a company works from every angle. This program is built for someone who is ready to take on leadership positions or high level employee in the next 2 years.
Key Responsibilities:Collaborate with three different functions (Aquisition & Retention, Demand Generation, Merchandising and Product) in 8 month rotations in order to build your knowledge and bring value to the company.Conduct market research and analysis to identify trends, consumer preferences, and competitive landscape, and translate findings into actionable insights to guide product development, marketing strategies, and content creation strategies.Rotate between 3 different positions over a 2 year time period and compete against sales goals Work closely with cross-functional teams such as marketing, sales, operations, and quality assurance to ensure seamless execution of projects.Monitor sales performance, analyze key performance indicators (KPIs), and generate reports to track product performance, identify areas for improvement, and recommend corrective actions as needed.Stay up-to-date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and regulatory requirements to anticipate market changes and capitalize on growth opportunities.
Qualifications:Bachelors or Masters degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Supply Chain Management, or related field.2-3 years of full-time, proven experience in Ecommerce, Sales, Product management, Merchandising or digital/ social media marketingStrong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, draw conclusions, and make data-driven decisions.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with internal teams and external partners.Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.Proactive problem solver with a results-driven mindset and a passion for driving business growth.Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, PowerPoint, Word) and experience with inventory management software is a plus. Benefits:Competitive salary packagePaid housing for 2 years up to $1,800 a month 50% Co-Pay on dental & health insurancePaid time off and holidaysProfessional development opportunitiesEmployee discounts on MakarttPro products H1B Sponsorship for International Students

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: MakarttPro Leadership Development Program
output_json.summary: A 4-year leadership development program focusing on building leadership and management skills.
preferred_degrees: Bachelors or Masters degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Supply Chain Management, or related field
job_responsibilities: Collaborate with three different functions in 8 month rotations
Rotate between 3 different positions over 2 years
benefits: Paid housing for 2 years up to $1,800 a month
output_json.company_information: MakarttPro is a leading provider of professional nail products.
